sentences.sContent: The report emphasizes the importance of improving safety standards.
sentences.sCn: 报告强调了改进安全标准的重要性。

sentences.sContent: Logan made a speech emphasizing the need for more volunteers.
sentences.sCn: 罗根发表演讲，强调需要更多的志愿者。

sentences.sContent: ...yet I have to emphasize the battle isn't over...
...all of whom emphasize athletics far less in school...
...While schools emphasize its usefulness-online research in class and instant polling of students...
...Still others emphasize the role of race...
...the whole society should emphasize the importance of Chinese language in order to make it clear that it is one indispensable part of Chinese culture and Chinese race...

remMethod.val: em ＋ phas(看作phrase， 用短语表达) ＋ ize → 用短语表达是为了强调 → 强调

trans.tranOther: to say something in a strong way
